bibdata.title: IEEE Guide for Assessing, Monitoring, and Mitigating Aging Effects on Electrical Equipment Used in Nuclear Power Generating Stations and Other Nuclear Facilities
IEEE Guide for Assessing, Monitoring, and Mitigating Aging Effects on Electrical Equipment Used in Nuclear Power Generating Stations and Other Nuclear Facilities
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Std IEEE Std 1205(TM)-2014 (Revision of IEEE Std 1205-2000) (Revision of IEEE Std 1205-2000)

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Guidelines for assessing, monitoring, and mitigating aging degradation effects on electrical equipment used in nuclear power generating stations and other nuclear facilities are provided. This guide also includes informative annexes on aging mechanisms, environmental monitoring, condition monitoring, aging program essential attributes, and examples demonstrating the application of the basic principles described in this guideline.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
